name: Fruit of Fulfillment
description:
Character deals +1 DMG.
When played: Draw 2 cards.
(Can only be equipped by Catalyst characters. Characters can equip at most 1 Weapon)

storytext: "Even the most bitter of stories contain courage and strength... The story of the good Golden Nara's adventures with us will help good Nara defend the forest."
